page.title: 20A Typical Week-end(cont.)
page.content: At half past two we catch the bus home to Broadwas and get off at the Village Shop. We then walk down to the church and spend two or three hours cleaning it. We then walk home and have a late meal at seven o'clock. I watch television for a while and then go to bed. On Sunday I get up at half past ten and then go into the village for a rehearsal with the Cedar's Orchestral Group. After a late lunch I go to play with my friend again until eight o'clock. My mother, who has been playing the organ at church, comes to tke me home. I get my things ready for school the next day then watch television for a while before going to bed. Nicola Wilding.
